title: 2026-27 Budget Deficit — $10.4M Projected Shortfall
brief: Springfield SD 19 faces a projected $10.4 million deficit for the 2026-27 school year. The shortfall was presented at the February 12 Budget Committee Work Session and is driven by declining enrollment, rising costs, and Oregon's enrollment-based funding model. The budget committee is reviewing options including program reductions, staffing adjustments, and reserve utilization.

title: Board Position 2 Vacancy — Appointment Process Underway
brief: Board Position 2 is vacant and the board is conducting the statutory appointment process. A public application period was held, and candidate interviews took place at the Special Meeting on February 20, 2026. The board will vote to appoint a new member who will serve until the next regular election.

title: Lane ESD Local Service Plan Review
brief: Lane ESD presented its streamlined 11-page Local Service Plan to the Springfield board for review. The plan outlines the menu of services and custom offerings available to Springfield SD 19, including special education, technology support, and school improvement services. The board's input is required as part of the plan approval process.
